message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $1,500,000 to us. Considering its immense worth to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This is an excellent chance to secure such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
